content: keep the sun out of their eyes as they build sand castles in the sky with this cool hat this crochet bucket hat pattern is worked entirely in single_crochet at a tighter gauge than usual for added structure created in bernat softee cotton it s easy to care for and perfect for summer fun the brim features a gentle flutter for a delicate touch pick your favorite shade and practice single_crochet in the round to make this essential hat for beach-side living yarn for model bernat® softee® cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m blue waves 69025 1 ball
